channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Retreat From Highs
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures settled lower, giving back some of the week’s solid gains, as the cold shot driving demand was seen dissipating after the wee...

item.title: Dow Industrials Fall Slightly; Treasury Yields Rise on Inflation Concerns
item.description: U.S. stocks bounced between gains and losses before ending mixed as concerns about softer spending by lower-income customers dragged down consumer-goo...

item.title: ‘I hate to be the interfering mother-in-law’: My son bought a house with his wife — so why is his father-in-law on the deed?
item.description: “I asked him if he was also on the deed. He said yes.”

item.title: I have two life-insurance policies, but ‘rude’ agents keep calling me to change the terms. How do I stop this harassment?
item.description: “The agent said that my policy is in jeopardy of lapsing.”

item.title: Nvidia’s stock misses out on the big chip rally after Broadcom earnings
item.description: One analyst noted that the type of AI chip Broadcom makes could pick up market share relative to “costly” graphics processing units.

item.title: U.S. Cattle Futures Rise to Record Highs on Import Snags, Screwworm Infestation
item.description: Canada and Mexico are among the leading countries exporting beef to the U.S., making tariff threats on these countries particularly important to the c...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled down 1.2% Friday and silver fell 1.8%, with both metals down for two consecutive sessions. For the week, gold posted a gain, while silver...

item.title: My husband filed for divorce, but did not contribute one penny towards the mortgage. Is he entitled to half of our home?
item.description: “He forced me to pay every payment.”

item.title: Broadcom’s stock sees its best day ever as investors get ‘a reason to dream’
item.description: Analysts found things to nitpick in Broadcom’s earnings but noted major resonance in AI.

item.title: The WSJ Dollar Index Rises 0.1% to 101.21
item.description: The WSJ Dollar Index was up 0.1% to 101.21 — higher for six consecutive trading days.
